description:
A Snort IDS/IPS dashboard build on Elastisearch, using data parsed from Graylog.

Based on the setup from IT Security Labs:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWitHleGFd8

And the original Security Panel dashboard by Tal Bar-Or:

https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/3099
title: Snort IDS/IPS Dashboard
